price: Para admoestares um povo, cujos pais não foram admoestados: então, estão desatentos.
arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābāuhum fahum ghāfilūna
